List of Review Chapters Relating to Electrochemistry

Revision date: July 18, 2015.

Go to: Electrochemistry Knowledge, the home base, from where you can connect to ESTIR, Dictionary, and the Encyclopedia. Recent reviews – Source abbreviations – Year index – Search – ESTIR Home Page – Electrochemistry Encyclopedia – Electrochemistry Dictionary – ECS Home Page

This compilation of review chapters on electrochemistry: science, engineering, and technology is collected from multi-author advances/review books published in English since 1950. Contributions from selected review journals are also included. In all probability, these reviews (and their reference lists) contain all major advances made in electrochemistry during the last few decades. Hopefully, this listing will provide a useful information source for students and research workers of electrochemistry. Many of the sources used are not included in standard abstracting services. The file contains more than 7,000 reviews.

The reviews are listed in chronological order by year of publication, and in alphabetical order by first author for each year. Publication information (editor, title, publisher, etc) is coded in source abbreviations listed at the beginning of the file. The file can be viewed in its entirety or by year. If you wish, you can also carry out a keyword search of this file. You can not search the “source abbreviations“ through this command, for that you must use the search function of your internet browser.

The collection is complete till 2014. Further items will be added only after the Society appoints a new editor.

See also compilations of electrochemistry books and proceedings.

INDEX

Source abbreviations – 1950 – 1951 – 1952 – 1953 – 1954 – 1955 – 1956 – 1957 – 1958 – 1959 – 1960 – 1961 – 1962 – 1963 – 1964 – 1965 – 1966 – 1967 – 1968 – 1969 – 1970 – 1971 – 1972 – 1973 – 1974 – 1975 – 1976 – 1977 – 1978 – 1979 – 1980 – 1981 – 1982 – 1983 – 1984 – 1985 – 1986 – 1987 – 1988 – 1989 – 1990 – 1991 – 1992 – 1993 – 1994 – 1995 – 1996 – 1997 – 1998 – 1999 – 2000 – 2001 – 2002 – 2003 – 2004 – 2005 – 2006 – 2007 – 2008 – 2009 – 2010 – 2011 – 2012 – 2013 – 2014

List of source abbreviations

A – B – C – D – E – F – G – H – I – K – L – M – N – O – P – R – S – T – U – V – W

S. Stojadinovic, R. Vasilic, B. Kasalica, I. Belca, and L. Zekovic, MAEC V 57, Ch 5, pp 241-302, 2014.

Copper foil smooth on both sides for lithium-ion battery
A. Suzuki and J, Shinozaki, CENE Ch 10, pp 229-265, 2014.

Electrochemistry of graphene: The current state of the art
S. Szunerits and R. Boukherroub, ESPR V 12, Ch 7, pp 211-242, 2014.

Build-up printed wiring boards (build-up PWBs) (copper electrodeposition)
K. Takagi and T. Okubo, CENE Ch 9, pp 193-227, 2014.

Nano aspects of advanced positive electrodes for lithium-ion batteries
K. Tatsumi, NTAB Ch 3, pp 23-30, 2014.

Development of glass-based solid electrolytes for lithium-ion batteries
M. Tatsumisago and A. Hayashi, NTAB Ch 7, pp 63-80, 2014.

Battery modelling for crash safety simulation
G. Trattnig and W. Leitgeb, AUBT Ch 2, pp 19-35, 2014.

Electrochemical synthesis of metal oxides for energy applications
L.-k. Tsui and G Zangari, MAEC V 57, Ch 4, pp 217-239, 2014.

Nonaqueous electrolytes with advances in solvents
M. Ue, Y. Sasaki, Y. Tanaka, and. Morita, MAEC V 58, Ch 2, pp 93-166, 2014.

Electrochemistry at nanoelectrodes
A.J. Wain, ESPR V 12, Ch 2, pp 44-86, 2014.

Analytical methods for investigation of lithium-ion battery ageing
S. Weber, S. Nowak, and F. Schappacher, AUBT Ch 5, pp 71-87, 2014.

Interphases between electrolytes and anodes in li-ion battery
M. Xu, L. Xing, and W. Li, MAEC V 58, Ch 5, pp 227-282, 2014.

Positive electrodes of nano-scale for lithium-ion batteries (focusing on nano-size effects)
J.-i. Yamaki, NTAB Ch 2, pp 7-22, 2014.

Copper electrodeposition
M. Yokoi, CENE Ch 1, pp 3-25, 2014.

Suppression effect and additive chemistry (copper electrodeposition)
M. Yokoi, CENE Ch 2, pp 27-43, 2014.

Lithium–air batteries
T. Zhang and N. Imanishi, NTAB Ch 15, pp 227-241, 2014.
